TopicTitle: When version 1.0 of KSP rolls out this is what it should look like...

Articles.Content:

and I believe Squad could actually pull it off!!

Happy Launch Anniversary Apollo 11
You may want to check out Orbiter instead.

http://sploid.gizmodo.com/amazing-photos-from-nasas-vaults-show-how-they-assemble-1605378889

and I believe Squad could actually pull it off!!

Happy Launch Anniversary Apollo 11

Always a good idea to set the bar high, then fall slightly short! However, I think you're settin the bar somewhere close to Jool.. lol

You want KSP's sci-fi interplanetary ships to look like 50+ year old lunar technology from one particular Earth country?

To be honest, function dictates form and apart from better electronics and, particularly computers, I doubt if China's highest-high-tech first-to-Mars stuff looks much different, even now. Still, I'd like to see something a little more futuristic and/or alien than obsolete.
